For a 1-person mining rig: Stay away from anything old(er) and mainstream.
Currently for a Bitcoin Mining rig you need to invest into scores of AISIC-based mining cards at 100 fantastillion a pop and have the money to upgrade them every 6 month at least. The same (but lagging behind in time) goes for ethreum except that because of bugs they already had 2 hard forks in the bast (meaning that all the mined currency became worthless).

Do a sensible calculation (use Excel maybe) based on what capital you have, what part of that you can invest in hardware and what into electricity. Then pick a currency that is still mineable using CPU or GPU mining and still has a reasonable revenue without too much risk.
Dont be afraid to jump to the next if you see that the current one becomes unprofitable.
